name: Ug! Caveman Game
description:
Ug! a caveman game you control with your voice.

If a caveman is near and you call out "UG!, UG!, UG!" they will follow you! 
Lead your fellow cavemen to safety, avoid hazards and dangers.

 

Current Features:

Unique Gameplay,
10 Levels (more to come),
Gamepad Support.

 You need a microphone to play this game

 The game is early access, we want to update the game with suggestions and feedback from the community.

The current demo and paid build are the same so you can try the game out.
The only difference is the paid version will get updates and entitles you to a key for the games full release.
Price reduced while in development. 

Join our Discord:  https://discord.gg/7SvZVygK79
